'''High-Flying Fish Flag''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint can be obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]]. The Remarkable Chest is available after unlocking [[The Sea of Fog and the Rite of the Trees]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest along the path in the south of [[Autake Plains]] on Tsurumi Island.
